summary: Adds a comfortable home for the player in Dragon Bridge.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FF0000][b]The files and images associated with this mod are to remain on the Nexus (nexusmods.com). If you wish to use this mod with your own, and upload it, please contact me for approval.[/b][/color]

[b]Dragon Bridge Home - By McclaudEagle[/b]

Version: 1.0
Author: McclaudEagle

[b][u]Description[/u][/b]

This mod adds a nice and comfortable home in Dragon Bridge. The home is fully navmeshed, has a double bed for you and your wife/husband, a bed for a companion and crafting facilities.

[b][u]Version 1.1[/u][/b]

This updated version is on the way soon hopefully, and adds a weapon rack, fills in some missing navmesh, makes a few fixes and tweaks and also add marriage compatibility. Please be patient as the marriage compatibility part is taking a while to create.

[b][u]Installation[/u][/b]

Simply extract the Dragon Bridge Home.esp file into your Skyrim Data folder.

Steam > SteamApps > Common > Skyrim > Data

[b][u]Uninstallation[/u][/b]

Simply deactivate and delete the Dragon Bridge Home.esp file.

[b][u]Compatibility Issues[/u][/b]

This mod may conflict with other mods that affect the Dragon Bridge area.

[b][u]Known Issues[/u][/b]

None so far.

If you have an idea that might improve the mod, or found a bug, please make a comment and I\'ll take a look at it.

Thanks,

McclaudEagle
author: McclaudEagle
